html:
Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_i9cqg6xd&referenceId=1_i9cqg6xd&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Stocktube

Description: Fobi AI CEO Rob Anson joined Steve Darling from Proactive to share news the company has signed an agreement with Amazon for distribution and fulfillment of Fobi AI’s various hardware products. Anson also told Proactive as part of the deal, the company will also become an Amazon Business Seller which gives Fobi access to Amazon’s global e-commerce, logistics and fulfillment infrastructure. Fobi is expecting to launch its Fobi 3.0 IoT hardware devices soon on Amazon Business.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3rKr62T
